log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"filename":"index.html","content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Sunset Through Mountains</title>
  <style>
    body, html {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      height: 100%;
      background: #000;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
    }
    svg {
      max-width: 100%;
      height: auto;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- SVG Illustration: Sunset Through Mountains -->
  <svg width="800" height="600" viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <defs>
      <!-- Sky gradient -->
      <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FF5F6D" />
        <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#FFC371" />
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2C3E50" />
      </linearGradient>
      <!-- Sun gradient -->
      <radialGradient id="sunGradient" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFD194" />
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FF7E5F" />
      </radialGradient>
    </defs>
    <!-- Sky background -->
    <rect width="800" height="600" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />

    <!-- Sun -->
    <circle cx="400" cy="380" r="80" fill="url(#sunGradient)" />

    <!-- Distant mountains -->
    <path d="M0,450 L150,350 L300,450 L450,330 L600,450 L800,300 L800,600 L0,600 Z" fill="#556270" />
    <!-- Midground mountains -->
    <path d="M0,550 L200,420 L350,550 L500,400 L650,550 L800,380 L800,600 L0,600 Z" fill="#34495E" />
    <!-- Foreground mountains -->
    <path d="M0,600 L250,480 L400,600 L550,460 L700,600 L800,520 L800,600 Z" fill="#2C3E50" />

  </svg>
</body>
</html>"}
